physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 1.63 m, Weight: 64 kg, BMI: 24.1 kg/mÂ²
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Progeroid features including pinched nose, micrognathia, dry and atrophic skin, alopecia, generalized lipodystrophy, nonhealing wound on the left medial malleolus, limited mobility of knees, elbows, and ankle joints.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive complaints of knee pain beginning at age 30. At age 35, developed chronic ulcer on right elbow with sclerotic and atrophic skin. At age 43, noted progeroid facies.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum alkaline phosphatase: 440 U/liter, AST: 118 U/liter, ALT: 135 U/liter, GGT: 527 U/liter, total bilirubin: 2.0 mg/dl, plasma uric acid: 8.4 mg/dl, random plasma glucose: 11.8 mmol/liter, HDL cholesterol: 0.85 mmol/liter.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Skeletal survey revealed osteopenia and calcifications in knees, elbows, ankles. Left knee showed joint space reduction and erosion of bones causing varus deformity. Mild lumbar dextro-convex scoliosis observed.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially noted degenerative changes in knees at age 30, with progressive worsening and need for total knee replacement at age 38, followed by removal of prosthesis due to septic arthritis.
